value.name: The Chair
value.overview: At a major university, the first woman of color to become chair tries to meet the dizzying demands and high expectations of a failing English department.

value.name: The Chair
value.overview: Contestants must answer questions while connected to a heart-rate monitor. If their heart-rate goes above a certain point they start losing money until they calm down. Presented by John McEnroe (who also presented the US version).

value.name: The Director's Chair
value.overview: Robert Rodriguez sits down with the industry's most iconic directors and engages in a revealing and unexpected exchange about the world of filmmaking.

value.name: The Chair
value.overview: This documentary series follows two first-time film directors, Shane Dawson and Anna Martemucci, who are given the opportunity to direct separate films adapted from the same original screenplay. The series documents the creation, marketing, and theatrical release of both films, and through multiplatform voting, the audience will ultimately determine which director will be awarded $250,000.

value.name: The Chair
value.overview: The Chair is a game show television program that premiered on ABC in January 2002. It was hosted by former tennis champion John McEnroe and directed by Michael A. Simon. Among the show's writers was writer/actress Teresa Strasser, who had served on ABC's Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? and later hosted While You Were Out after The Chair was cancelled.

value.name: The Director's Chair
value.overview: The Director's Chair is a show about movies and the people who make them. Each week, the show features a short film and interviews that film's director about their inspirations and process!

value.name: The Twelve Chairs
value.overview: Set in late-1920s Soviet Union, Ostap Bender and Ippolit "Kisa" Vorobyaninov are after a stash of diamonds hidden in one of the chairs in 12-chair set. They are forced to go on a cross-country chase when the chairs are auctioned off.

value.name: The Chair Company
value.overview: After an embarrassing incident at work, a man finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

value.name: Level 9 Chairman
value.overview: A school-life comic in which a delinquent student named Na I-soo becomes the chairman of an elite school that was left behind by his father. It depicts the dynamic process of Na I-soo who has lived a rough life and the greatest elite students of the school, getting to know each other and changing.

value.name: Chair
value.overview: An omnibus drama depicting the stories of 8 women and 8 unique chairs.

value.name: The Life and Death of Ferdinand Luce
Chairman Park's Picture Warehouse
value.overview: Based on the novel by Lee Eun

value.name: Goosebumps: The Vanishing
value.overview: When twins Devin and Cece are sent to spend a summer in Gravesend, Brooklyn with their divorced dad, scientist Anthony Brewer, they must band together with new friends to save the neighborhood from a long-dormant threat.
